attributes.action: Make Friday apart of the weekend for schools and works
attributes.additional_details: Making Friday apart of the weekend would send productivity through the roof, they did this at Google and the productivity went about 40% higher then only having Saturday and Sunday off due to having more time to wind down from stress of work and school as we only have Saturday and then we worry on Sunday due to having work/school the next day it would give us a real break helping us actually concentrate at work/school
attributes.background: Make Friday a part of the weekend for days off of school and work like Saturdays unless you work weekends

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open, which you might like to sign:

Change the school week to a four day week
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
